reviews.name: KIDDE i12060 Smoke Alarm, Ionization, 120VAC, 9V
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to connect as it was a replacement for the same brand. Your price can't be beat and it arrived within a couple of days after ordering. I do have to return one alarm since I didn't realize that one of the alarms wasn't just a smoke alarm but a smoke/carbon dioxide alarm. Hopefully, the return service will be as great as the ordering service.
reviews.title: So Far So Good

reviews.name: KIDDE i12060 Smoke Alarm, Ionization, 120VAC, 9V
reviews.reviewText: an excellent product / easy to change battery and install and only one button operation thanks
reviews.title: an easy way to protect your house

reviews.name: KIDDE i12060 Smoke Alarm, Ionization, 120VAC, 9V
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to install & works great. Have Kidde brand throughout home
reviews.title: Great

reviews.name: KIDDE i12060 Smoke Alarm, Ionization, 120VAC, 9V
reviews.reviewText: The smoke alarms were exactly what I wanted to replace some that were 15 years old. I needed 9 for the whole house. I shopped around and believe that this item was the best buy at Walmart.
reviews.title: Great value
